com.tang.hwplib.objects.docinfo.borderfill.fillinfo

Class HWPGradientFill

  • com.tang.hwplib.objects.docinfo.borderfill.fillinfo.HWPGradientFill

  • public class HWPGradientFill

    그러데이션을 나타내는 객체 그러데이션 채우기 (type & 0x0000004 != 0)
